pullRequest.title: Introduce an Admin REST API resource to get all Bot Detected data
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
This PR will introduce an admin REST API resource to get all Bot Detected data.
Approach

Added a new resource /bot-detection-data with a GET operation to admin-api.yaml.
Introduced new Schemas as BotDetectionDataList and BotDetectionData to represent the Bot Detection Data DTO.
Added the functionality to fetch the saved Bot Detected Data from the "AM_BOT_DATA" table.
Added a new BotDetectionMappingUtil.java class to convert Bot Detection Data model objects to Bot Detection Data DTOs.
Introduced a new Exception code as follows to handle the situation when the request is sent when Analytics is not enabled.

ANALYTICS_NOT_ENABLED(901600, "%s not accessible", 404, "Analytics should be enabled to access %s"");

User Stories

Request

curl -X GET -H "Authorization: Bearer 23df4e7b-4a26-3e72-8d89-285669c2af02" "https://localhost:9443/api/am/admin/v1/bot-detection-data" -H  "accept: application/json"

Closes: wso2/product-apim#8119

commit.message: Add an Admin REST API resource to get all bot detected data
Introduce DTOs related to bot detection
Introduce bot-detection-data resource to get bot detection data
Add functionality to extract bot detection data content
